attributes.action: All convicted rioters in UK to pay compensation to cover the costs of damages
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to be signed by those that believe all convicted rioters in the UK should pay a sum of compensation. This compensation that is paid shall form an amount of money that shall be used to cover the costs of damages made be these rioters. Therefore reducing the amount of money that the taxpayer has to pay to cover the cost of damages.
